message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DB. 

The paper is about ad hoc retrieval, which is a subfield of information retrieval (IR) in computer science. Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses language models, which are commonly used in natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML), suggesting cs.CL and cs.LG as likely sub-categories. The iterative process described in the paper involves updating the query based on pseudo-feedback, which is a technique used in many ML algorithms, indicating cs.AI as a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper mentions clustering, which is a technique used in data mining and databases, suggesting cs.DB as a possible sub-category.
